QueryResult.text: select v.partition_code, p.depth, v.id view_id, v.code view_code,v.object_code, v.view_type from cmn_partitions p, odf_views v where v.partition_code = p.code and v.PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'ADMINISTRATOR' union select v.partition_code, -1 depth, v.id view_id, v.code view_code,v.object_code, v.view_type from odf_views v where v.partition_code = 'NIKU.ROOT'
